/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. 

Cars and buses, the lifeblood of the city, are scattered along the road, their colors muted under the clear blue sky. Trees line the street, their leaves a vibrant green against the urban backdrop. Streetlights stand sentinel at regular intervals, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls.

The sky above is a canvas of blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the world around them.
